channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- BigFix Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- BigFix Platform

item.title: CVE-2016-0297|2024-08-05T22:15:23.308Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager - Mobile Device Management (MDM) could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information due to a missing HTTP Strict-Transport-Security Header through man in the middle techniques.

item.title: CVE-2016-0214|2024-08-05T22:08:13.357Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious file. The only way that file would be executed would be through a phishing attack to trick an unsuspecting victim to execute the file.

item.title: CVE-2016-0396|2024-08-05T22:15:24.354Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager could allow a user under special circumstances to inject commands that would be executed with unnecessary higher privileges than expected.

item.title: CVE-2016-0296|2024-08-05T22:15:23.146Z -- ibm%20corporation -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager - Mobile Device Management (MDM) stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be available to a local user.
